title: Aagaasa Nilavu Dhaan Lyrics Manja Pai
stanzas:
aagaasa nilavu dhaan
azhagaa theriyala
aani muthu adhuvume
azhagaa theriyala
unnai pola azhagudhaan
onnum illa ulagile
ottu moththa azhagaiyum
konda neeyum usurile

saami koduththa varame,
needhaane enakku raasa
nindhu vaazhndhu kaatta venum
indha puviyil romba perusaa

aagaasa nilavu dhaan
azhagaa theriyala
aani muthu adhuvume
Â azhagaa theriyala

sooriyana kelu,
vaangi naan tharuven
sandhiranai kelu,
kondu naan varuven
vanga kadalai
nee sinna kuvalaiyil mondu
varachollu senjiduven
singam siruththaiyai oththai
adiyila kondu varachollu senjiduven
ulage azhinjaalum,
unai naan kaathiduven
ennoda perumaiyenna
oan uruvil paarthiduven

aagaasa nilavu dhaan
azhagaa theriyala
aani muthu adhuvume
azhagaa theriyala

eppovume needhaan ennoda aavi
pattam pala vaangu
aaganum medhaavi
unna vida oru soththu
sugam indha mannil
illaiyena solliduven
kannu mani yena unna
nenaichu naan kaiyyil
eduthu dhaan konjiduven
edhaiyum unakkaaga
soluva senjiduven
oththai nodi piriya
chonna erandhe poyiduven

aagaasa nilavu dhaan
azhagaa theriyala
aani muthu adhuvume
azhagaa theriyala

unnai pola azhagudhaan
onnum illa ulagile
ottu moththa azhagaiyum
konda neeyum usurile

saami koduththa varame,
needhaane enakku raasa
nindhu vaazhndhu kaatta venum
indha puviyil romba perusaa
